personal.name: Muhammad Aziz Rahman
personal.about: Muhammad Aziz Rahman, a highly motivated and detail-oriented physics undergraduate from University of Indonesia, I have a strong passion for geospatial analysis, machine learning, and computer vision. With my current position as a Data Engineer at PT Aptaworks and IT Solution Track & Trace role at Philip Morris International, I have honed my skills in Python programming, data pipelines, machine learning, and DevSecOps infrastructure management. My experience working on data-driven projects (especially in Supply Chain Management) and solid academic background have given me a strong foundation in analytical thinking and problem-solving. Committed to staying up-to-date with the latest advancements in the field, I strive to consistently deliver high-quality work.
